labels.analysis: The MCP Server focuses on providing real-time insights and analytics related to gaming trends across multiple platforms like Steam and Epic Games Store. Its core functionality revolves around fetching trending, top-selling, and most-played game data, along with free game promotions. The server helps users stay updated with the latest gaming industry developments and facilitates data-driven decisions by offering standardized access to gaming market metrics.
labels.reasoning: The primary label "Gaming" is chosen because the server's main purpose is to provide gaming-related data and analytics. The secondary label "Web Search & Research" is included because the server helps users discover and analyze gaming trends, which can be considered a form of research. The secondary label "Data Analysis & Processing" is also relevant as the server processes and provides analytical data. No custom label is needed as the predefined categories adequately cover the server's functionality.

tools.name: get_steam_trending_games
tools.description: Get real trending games from Steam platform with live data from multiple sources.

tools.description: Get real top selling games from Steam platform with live sales data.

tools.description: Get real-time most played games from Steam with live player statistics from SteamCharts.

tools.name: get_epic_free_games
tools.description: Get current and upcoming free games from Epic Games Store with real promotion data.

tools.name: get_epic_trending_games
tools.description: Get trending games from Epic Games Store.

tools.name: get_all_trending_games
tools.description: Get comprehensive real-time gaming data from all platforms (Steam and Epic Games).

tools.name: get_api_health
tools.description: Check the health status of the Gaming Trend Analytics API.

server_info_crawled.overview: Provide real-time insights and analytics on gaming trends to help users stay updated with the latest developments in the gaming industry. Enable data-driven decisions by exposing relevant game trend data and metrics through a standardized interface. Facilitate integration with other tools and applications for enhanced gaming market analysis.

server_info_crawled.python_sdk:
import mcp
from mcp.client.streamable_http import streamablehttp_client
import json
import base64

smithery_api_key = ""
url = f"https://server.smithery.ai/@halismertkir/game-trends-mcp/mcp?api_key={smithery_api_key}"

async def main():
    # Connect to the server using HTTP client
    async with streamablehttp_client(url) as (read_stream, write_stream, _):
        async with mcp.ClientSession(read_stream, write_stream) as session:
            # Initialize the connection
            await session.initialize()
            # List available tools
            tools_result = await session.list_tools()
            print(f"Available tools: {', '.join([t.name for t in tools_result.tools])}")

if __name__ == "__main__":
    import asyncio
    asyncio.run(main())
